nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_654_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: According to the survey, students and children accounted for more than 50% of the visitors to Euro Disneyland last year.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_655_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: These employees thought banning moustaches and beards amounted to violating their individual rights.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_656_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Most of the student guides work for the theme park on a voluntary basis.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_657_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The theme park is gearing up for the invasion of tourists in the coming summer vacation period.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_658_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Uncertainty again hangs over the company's current financial conditions and many stockholders are selling its shares.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_659_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Manufacturing companies spend millions of pounds trying to convince customers that their products are superior to those of other companies.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_660_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The union representative argued that the practices of banning moustaches, excess weight and short skirts were not in line with French labor law.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_661_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The stock prices of the company are too high now, but they are going to be all right in the long term.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_662_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He wrote to warn me against going to the east coast because it was so full of tourists.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_663_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Success doesn't only depend on what you do. What you don't do is equally important.
